column4: in 9.04 my sound works. But when trying to play music in Amarok I get no sound whatsoever. If i go to settings and select the main sound card and test it I hear the test sound. But no Music can be heard. any one know how I can try and get sound working in amarok?
have you checked the volume settings for PCM?
right click on the volume control in the notification area and choose 'open volume contro' check the levels across the board to ensure nothing is mutes
nope theyre all up and not muted.
